name: DoubleHeartTaps
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Double Heart Taps offers daily encouragement and breath-informed guidance. It is hosted by Aumrie, a California based storyteller and essayist who encourages audiences to live the full expression of their lives. Drawing inspiration from meditation suttas and the worlds wisdom traditions, listeners are encouraged to find ease and they allow the purpose and gifts of their hearts to unfold. Part self-discovery and part tender reflections, Double Heart Taps offers space to be nourished and uplifted while encouraging daily ethics, discipline and effort. 

We're developing models to to use creative writing, meditation and tea presentations practices to recalibrate and achieve with less resistance and force. Cultivate abundance and fade unease.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
